website_summaries.verdict: Eliminate hot spots and restore the heat distribution on your Weber grill with these porcelain-enameled flavorizer bars.
pros: Patented porcelain-enameled steel bars create delicious, barbecue flavor
Fits most Weber Spirit 200, Spirit 500, and Genesis Silver A series grills
cons: Only fit certain knob configurations, so be sure yours works
Look for a model number or measure old ones

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for 21.5" grill
customer_reviews.text: These last me 3-4 years, using the grill almost weekly - probably around 35 meals per year. Based on that, and knowing that the food I eat is coming off of these, I stick with the brand name hoping that their coatings are not harmful - I don't trust "cheaper" products with potentially unregulated paint materials which could outgas into my food.
customer_reviews.author: meep

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacements!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to have found these. I am replacing parts in an 8 year old grill and these were very reasonably priced. They are exactly as described by the seller. They are excellent quality and fit perfectly! Highly recommend if you are looking for replacement parts for your Weber Spirit grill.
customer_reviews.author: Lea A Foster

customer_reviews.title: These arrived quickly but upon opening the package I found ...
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly but upon opening the package I found that the enamel was chipping and cracking off the bars. With the metal already exposed, I doubt it would take long to start rusting. I think this is a problem with Weber, not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Burns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and replacement part. Works in Weber Spirit 210.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. This is the second time I have replaced them, it lasted about 5 years. It is nice to keep something going and not having to replace it when a part wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time in my grills' 17 year life that I have replaced the flavorizers. Eventually they get super caked on and cruddy. Just part of normal maintenance. I am glad they are still available.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Tried a few options at Home Depot that sounded like they would fit my old Weber Silver grill but ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few options at Home Depot that sounded like they would fit my old Weber Silver grill but they were just a bit too long. These fit perfectly. Weber grills last forever and these allow my 14 year old grill to keep on going.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD S ROMANO

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement grills
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the old ones that were worn out and falling apart from so much use. After cleaning the grill and installing the new grill slates I gave the grill to a friend that needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Like a new grill
customer_reviews.text: Guess the grill is 15+ years and and old bars just rotted away. New ones just fit in and grill cooks like new. New grill is $ 400. And think I have better use for money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W, NJ

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my grill using these
customer_reviews.text: Just what my grill needed. My grill "Flavorizer bars" were rusting and getting holes in them. I purchased​ these to replace the old rusty falling apart bars.
customer_reviews.author: MyReview

customer_reviews.title: Exact Fit
customer_reviews.text: We rebuilt the inside of our grill instead of purchasing a new one. All parts purchased on Amazon worked perfect. Replaced with ease. Highly recommend these weber products - we purchased three. This is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: LarryAndChelena

customer_reviews.title: Would order again.
customer_reviews.text: Fit just as expected. They were replacing the damaged units i got years ago from my grill. I ordered the grill special to hook up to my natural gas line so replacing the whole grill was not wanted. They arrived quickly, but not in the greatest packaging - however, they are solid metal and i would guess it would take a lot of damage to compromise the units. they arrived great, installed great and easy and got my grill back up and working.
customer_reviews.author: agreviewer

customer_reviews.title: The Weber 7534 Gas Grill Flavorizer Bar FIT
customer_reviews.text: Needed Flavorizer Bars to replace originals. The first ones lasted ten+ years and happy to find Weber replacements. Have looked at others but wrong length. Thank you for having replacement parts. I hate seeing grills trashed because of a part. Replace and Reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the Weber Genesis Silver A. Was worried with the reviews that said it might not fit. Not sure what grill they had but they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jill R

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: These are Weber brand replacement flavorizer bars. Fit my Weber Silver A perfect. Old bars were disintegrating, should have replaced years ago. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: s.lyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like that Weber has rebuildable products. I am still running a grill I bought in 08. I replaced the burner tubes and the bars. Grill still cooks like new
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Grill works like new!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are made by Weber for Weber grills and they fit perfectly in my grill. By installing a new burner tube and new flavorizer bars I was able to make an 11 year old grill operate as if it were new. Food cooks evenly and no flareups.
customer_reviews.author: baldeagle

customer_reviews.title: Weber for King
customer_reviews.text: Raid Weber, steal all of their ownership, union leaders, and executives, and force them to take over running the nation. I love that they continue to produce exactly what I need for a 15-year-old grill.
customer_reviews.author: Splarch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: The baffles or flavorizer bars as they are branded fit perfectly and did not disappoint in any way! My grill is used at least three a week for 52 weeks a year. Snow, rain, cold heat, humidity does not stop the grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Good as new!
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced the original flavorizer bars from my Weber E-series grill after 5 years. The originals had been subjected to coastal regions and 3 states all with high humidty. While they showed significant rust and erosion from rust and heat, they were still very functional. I expect these replacements to be as good as the originals. Weber grills are a great "investment" and amazon is a great source to for replacement parts in order to keep your grill for decades.
customer_reviews.author: T. Allison

customer_reviews.title: What was once old is new again!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that my hand-me-down grill was going to be hard to find replacement parts for, especially when I didn't know the model number, but these were just what I needed. The cold spot on the left side even went away and I can finally use the whole surface :) Go to Weber's site as they can narrow down exactly what you need after asking a few cosmetic questions about your grill.
customer_reviews.author: ardastra

customer_reviews.title: Revived my Weber grill!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and so far all is good. Cleaned the grease catch tray, replaced the flavorizer bars and hopefully the grill will last several more years! Besides the starter igniter, but those are always a pain. I didn't bother replacing that.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Very good replacement bars, lasted about a year before rusting
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice replacements for my original Weber Flavorizer Bars, and fit perfectly in my Weber Spirit 500. I picked them up a little over a year ago. The reason they aren't 5 stars, is that they have already started to rust a bit. I will try to get a picture of them to show.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff R.Top Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement for old Genesis A grill
customer_reviews.text: perfect replacement for the 20 yr Genesis A two burner, two side knob grill. Last set lasted 6
customer_reviews.author: amazonRocker

customer_reviews.title: Didn't want to through my Weber grill out even though ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to through my Weber grill out even though it is about 15 years old. So I replaced the guts including the grates, burner and flavor bars. Looks brand new inside and everything fit as they should.
customer_reviews.author: CGH

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: They are expensive but worth the money. You will get good service from this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: John Sciacchitano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for My Weber Grill
customer_reviews.text: These replacement bars for my grill fit perfectly and have worked fine. I expect a long life from these as I got from the original set. I did not rate the product five stars only because I've had these bars about a month and so I don't know how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Tlion

customer_reviews.title: Perfect refurb for an old grill
customer_reviews.text: Weber grills seem to last forever, so it was great to be able to replace the old rusted out "flavor bars" with new ones. Exact replacements for the originals.
customer_reviews.author: GeneK

customer_reviews.title: Delivery time on this item was "REALLY FAST! " ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery time on this item was "REALLY FAST!" It fit PERFECTLY and was part of a "GRILL-REBUILDING PROJECT", I'd been putting-off for the past 2 years. I should of bought this sooner! Thanks Guys! Ed
customer_reviews.author: edward j bryja

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old Weber. With new grates a little love and this sucker is a master.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flavor UP!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the flavorerizer bars, the enameled grates, and the burner tubes, and for less than $100 I had a brand new Weber grill. They're quite easy to install and really much cheaper than buying a new grill. The original grill was about $450 and lasted 6 years. If I can get 6 years out of the replacement parts, I'll do back flips. Recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: M. Granata

customer_reviews.title: Fits Weber Genesis Silver perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Happy and relieved to find replacement parts for my 14 year old grill this is only the second time I’ve replaced the flavorizer bars.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Was able yto keep my 20 year old wener grill.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and adds flavor to whatever I cook on the Grill
customer_reviews.author: emil kindle

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished old Weber Silver grill.
customer_reviews.text: Weber replacement part. We use a lot of marinades/sauces, so bars do deteriorate over time. We grill virtually year round.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work as it suppose to.
customer_reviews.text: Works good but wasn't the size I needed so I made it work tho.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rejsek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by Quality
customer_reviews.text: While visiting my parents, I purchased these replacement "flavorizer bars" for their Weber BBQ. When package arrived, I was disappointed with dents & missing paint on ends. My parents were pleased with gift, so I didn't bother to return. Still think Weber should have better quality control over their own replacement parts. I'm worried bars will rust more quickly with exposed ends.
customer_reviews.author: MEF

customer_reviews.title: BBQ's like it did the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Barbecue is now 18 years old. Replaced a few items and now expect to get another 18 more years out of it. Excellent product availability, quick delivery, and appropriately priced.
customer_reviews.author: William Garcia

customer_reviews.title: like new performance
customer_reviews.text: After 10 years the old Weber seemed ready for barby heaven, but I decided to look into replacing the guts. Pulled everything out, seriously cleaned the box, and installed new guts including these bars. Works like it did new and only cost about $100 for flavorizer bars, burner tubes, cooking grates, and igniter. I'm not handy AT ALL, but it was easy. Needed a philips screwdriver, and a 7/16's nut driver wasn't necessary but did come in handy. Took about an hour - somebody good at this stuff could do it in 20 or 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: hal96a

customer_reviews.title: Replaced the rusting orginal items
customer_reviews.text: OEM replacement with all the good and bad that comes with that. This metal will rust over time, but should provide several seasons of function which is not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: YardlyStone154

customer_reviews.title: My 15 year old Genesis Silver A will be good as new and ready for many more years
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time...saved me from getting off my can and shopping. New burners have been ordered. My 15 year old Genesis Silver A will be good as new and ready for many more years. You pay more for a Weber, but if you're willing to do some simple part replacement from time to time, it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True Weber Product
customer_reviews.text: Made a huge difference in my old Weber grill. Heating evenly again.
customer_reviews.author: RGTZ

customer_reviews.title: Made my old Weber grill new again!
customer_reviews.text: These bars fit perfectly on my Weber grill. My old ones were ancient and rusty. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: M.McFly

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong size bars again. I'm a moron!.
customer_reviews.text: My second attempt at replacing my flavorizer bars, and again, I did not get the correct sized bars. Noting Wrong with the product, everything about user error. Thank you, Amazon for a return policy that anticipates idiots like me.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Canty

customer_reviews.title: Flavorize your old Weber Grill
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned up the old Weber Genesis grill. The cover I bought years ago extended the life of this grill so much that I decided to get NEW FLAVORIZER BARS !!!! I Cleaned up everything else and It's working perfectly. I'm a very happy guy right now. These are porcelain coated, and MAY BE (not sure) a little thinner gauge than the originals. But if I get few more years out of this baby, I'm doing good.
customer_reviews.author: Vic from N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement (Weber brand), no issues. Only "complaint" ...
customer_reviews.text: Exact replacement (Weber brand), no issues. Only "complaint" was the size of the package it came in :). Minutes to replace, fir perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stonehollow

customer_reviews.title: What is to be said. If you have a Weber gas grill, you need them.
customer_reviews.text: The flavorizer bars are an essential part of the Weber Genesis gas grill which, the way I use it, need to be replaced every couple of years. They set directly over the flames, and help distribute the heat and protect the venturi of the heat element. Without them you get all kinds of flareups, uneven cooking, and are more likely to burn out the heating element. So, they do what they need to, and are an expendable part, like the air filter on a car.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality.  Perfect fit and function.
customer_reviews.text: Given a choice pay the fare and get the OEM ones. Quality fit and function.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph F.

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. Just make sure to pull one of the existing flavorizer bars out of the grill and take a measurement prior to purchasing. There are several sizes and it would be easy to mistake one for another.
customer_reviews.author: Twins1022

customer_reviews.title: Makes an old Weber new again
customer_reviews.text: Using this and the igniter replacement, my 10 year old Weber Spirit performs like new. Great product delivers long term rust resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cvetetic

customer_reviews.title: If you need a replacement good luck finding them at the hardware store
customer_reviews.text: Why do these things always rust out?!!! If you need a replacement good luck finding them at the hardware store. And if you do be prepared to PAY! I bought these from Amazona and I'm glad that I did. Now if Weber could just make them last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Just the item I needed
customer_reviews.text: Turn my old rusted out grill new again. For much less than replacing the grill
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome replacement
customer_reviews.text: My grill needed these badly. Not sure if it’s the bars or what, but the cooking has been on point since I replaced them!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi L-G

customer_reviews.title: Keep your Weber forever. Buy parts not new grills ...
customer_reviews.text: Keep your Weber forever. Buy parts not new grills. Thanks !!!
customer_reviews.author: Pipestem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our grill works like new again. We are excited to get many more years out of an excellent grill!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Fits old style Spirit E210
customer_reviews.text: This fit my old Spirit E-210 (with the knobs on the side, not the front). My grill was made in 2006-2007. If you are looking to breathe new life into your old grill, this fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Macy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement bars.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built replacement bars that match the original bars in every way. I bought them for my 10 year old Weber that still works great.
customer_reviews.author: R P O

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced burners on grills many times but never one as easy and straight forward as this. It took me 20 min. Amazing product Weber
customer_reviews.author: glow

customer_reviews.title: Fit our genesis 300
customer_reviews.text: Fits our Weber. We are fixing up an old Weber, these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my Weber grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my Weber grill. Just make sure you order the right ones for your grill. Mine is the Weber 210 which uses the 21 1/2 " size, some other grills use the 22 1/2", so be sure of your grill or measure your existing grill bar before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: jobefl

customer_reviews.title: Weber Gas Grill Flavorizer Bars great!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried I ordered the wrong size but these were perfect for our Weber Silver Genesis A gas grill. We opted for these because of the moderate price range. I realize we could have purchased the higher grade but it really isn't necessary. We purchased these from another vendor over 4 years ago and I think 4 years is pretty good for heavy grill use. Amazon was better price wise...wish I'd have ordered from them before!
customer_reviews.author: BJP

customer_reviews.title: original equipment
customer_reviews.text: should last longer than they do but that is due to the finish and durability of the material. Meant to last no longer than 5 years under less than average use.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey gold

customer_reviews.title: Standard replacement
customer_reviews.text: My Weber is 10 years old and still in great shape after perhaps 1,000 uses. My bars were however old and corroding. This are factory replacement bars so if you just need to replace your existing these are perfect. FYI - If your not sure on the size the Weber website has a super easy tool to make sure you purchase the right size, you don't even need to know your model number or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas P. Borrelli

customer_reviews.title: Weber part so works great
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old flavorizer bars. Look and work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Equigua-Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Clean and New!
customer_reviews.text: FIts perfectly in our Weber. A huge improvement - clean and new!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Levine

customer_reviews.title: Just like from original webber purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just like from original webber purchase. These wore out and all but disintegrated. replaced and we're back in flavorizer heaven. Home Depot did not have these stocked - Thank You Amazon
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great item just as described.
customer_reviews.text: I love having this item being exactly as described in the described when I received it. Just what I ordered. The down side wish it could have arrived just a little fast but it did arrive fast enough especially with the free shipping, no problem. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Collector Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my rusted out flavor bars. Along with the new burner I purchased and some general cleaning, I now have a (almost) brand new grill.
customer_reviews.author: MisterTee

customer_reviews.title: A nice grill sometimes needs replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful new genuine weber parts for our grill that we have had for most of our 10 year marriage. Really nothing wrong with the grill but these things were starting to erode into nothingness.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement Size
customer_reviews.text: At this point all I can rate these on is size. Exact size as the ones that came with the grill. Should be - they were made by Weber and are OEM. Can't tell you about how long they last until much later (hopefully). BTW - from prior experience, if you need to replace your flavorizer bars and your grill has a lot of life in it, consider the stainless steel bars if they are made for your grill. Cost twice as much but last 3-4 times as long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exact fit for my Weber Spirit 210. A little pricey but maybe these will last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S. Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I wanted. It was describe precisely and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JR Odyssey

customer_reviews.title: A needed replacement
customer_reviews.text: What's to say, this part of the grill usually needs replacing every 1 to 2 years. Appreciate Amazon service bringing them right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Kudos to Weber
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago I purchased the smallest gas grill that Weber offered. I was torn at the time between buying a small quality grill or a larger cheaper one. I have no regrets in choosing Weber. Although the grill I purchased (Genesis Silver A) is no longer available, Weber still makes parts for it. It took me less than one minute to change the rusted out flavour enhancing bars with the replacements. Bravo Weber!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: Fit my older Weber grill perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my older Weber grill perfectly. Just make sure you measure old bars before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: R. House

customer_reviews.title: Replacement bars work great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace worn flavor bars and they work great, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bashore

customer_reviews.title: Easily fit grill
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Easily fit grill. Doing very well. Pleased with purchase. Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to know that some barbecues stand the test of ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a pleasure dealing with Weber -- all the parts are available and high-quality. Great to know that some barbecues stand the test of time!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you order the correct bars as there are a couple of different sizes. Not much to say about V-shaped porcelain enameled steel parts that practically fall into place. These came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Weber 7534 Grill Flavorizer Bars
customer_reviews.text: Weber Flavorizer Bars fit my Weber perfectly and gave it new life. I even used the box to trash the OLD bars!!
customer_reviews.author: Luvmycards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: hard to screw up a product like this, should get several years out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Charkley

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why these makes such a difference, but they do!
customer_reviews.text: We didn't realize how important these were until we put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Jose H Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit - Great life-extender for an older BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Our Weber grill is nearly 10 years old, and has been used once or twice a week throughout those years. Although the burners have remained clean and work perfectly, the original "Flavorizer Bars" had deteriorated and corroded extensively. The new bars arrived promptly, and fit perfectly. Significant savings by buying from Amazon, rather than Weber. Happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Dunc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Price was a little vsalty but good quality i love them made my grill like new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made old Weber new again
customer_reviews.text: These made our grill like new! The old ones lasted well over 10 years. We'll see if these do the same.
customer_reviews.author: michele rubio-eickhoff

customer_reviews.title: Weber flavor bars.
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are still available for my 20 yr old Genesis. Fit perfectly. This is the second time I've replaced them.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly the right size for my Weber Spirit E210 grill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have gotten stainless steel but these will be fine. Be sure to measure what size you have before ordering. There's just a half inch or so between two sizes available.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: replaces stuff that was rusty and bad in general This from a Naval Vet with Parkinsons.
customer_reviews.author: Fly Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: To dam small
customer_reviews.text: They even show the picture of our exact grill.. Looked up model number ect & they said these were the ones.. We’ll to short for the grill now we will have to modify our self or go through all the trouble of returning .. sad & irritated ..
customer_reviews.author: Randi w

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fite for my Weber spirit and they smell great.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about thes? l If you need new flavorizer bars for your Weber gas grill...............this is what you have to buy. Was hard to figure out which ones we needed though because our manual didn't list a part number. Ordered the wrong ones first and had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Jones

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Same as when my grill was new no more flare ups
customer_reviews.author: Martin Cander

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and fit the grill just right.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and fit the grill just right. Take some time to research what fits your particular grill. Find the right one and it fits and does just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kryptonite

customer_reviews.title: Made my grill new for $85.00
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a new grill because my weber is about 18 years old.. Instead I spent about $85.00 on the grates, flavorizer bars and new igniter and now I have a new, old grill that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Original equipment is always the best
customer_reviews.text: Weber original products are great, but more expensive but work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Weber Flavorizer bars for my Weber grill. Tried another brand a couple of years ago but they rusted easily. You pay for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: These fit well but seem to catch grease more than ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit well but seem to catch grease more than the old ones and flame up. Maybe not as non stick as the old pair
customer_reviews.author: L Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Find the Replacements
customer_reviews.text: These came in a Weber box and look like the originals. The old ones were completely rusted out (almost to "dust") after 9 grilling seasons. I could not find these locally, and the price was comparable to ones that were not the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Apfels

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for Weber Silver A gas grill.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for Weber Silver A gas grill. My originals were rusted and had holes. Now it looks new and also replaced the enamel coated cooking grates with stainless steel (highly recommended).
customer_reviews.author: Castiel

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to rate the grill bars I bought from Amazon to replace the ones that corroded and fell apart but the ones I replaced lasted for almost ten years of heavy use. I think I got my money's worth at least from the bars and I am confident I will get my money's worth usage out the set I just got.
customer_reviews.author: MAS

product_meta.title: Weber 7534 Gas Grill Flavorizer Bars (21.5 x 1.7 x 1.7)
product_meta.description: Replacement porcelain-enameled flavorizer bars for Weber gas grills are made of heavy-gauge steel bars coated with a specially formulated porcelain enamel. Weber accessories are made to provide the same durable performance as our grills, so grilling can be a success every time. This Flavorizer bar fits Spirit 500 and Genesis Silver A gas grills. 5 bars. Item dimensions: 21.5”L x 1.75”W x 1.5”H.
feature_bullets: Patented steel bars create delicious, barbecue flavor
Works by vaporizing juices and fats to create smoke
Porcelain-enameled steel for even heat distribution
For use with Weber Spirit 500 and Genesis Silver A grills
Flavorizer bars come five in a pack
Constructed with porcelain enameled steel for corrosion-resistance and long-lasting use
Patented steel bars create delicious, barbecue flavor
Works by vaporizing juices and fats to create smoke
Porcelain-enameled steel for even heat distribution. Individual Carton Dimensions : 3.5 Inch H x 5.5 Inch W x 25 Inch D
For use with Weber Spirit 500 and Genesis Silver A grills
Flavorizer bars come five in a pack
